titleStmt.title: A prymer in Englyshe with certeyn prayers [et] godly meditations, very necessary for all people that vnderstonde not the Latyne tongue. Cum priuilegio regali.
Book of hours (Salisbury). English
titleStmt.author: Catholic Church.
Marshall, William, fl. 1535. aut
Joye, George, d. 1553. Ortulus anime. aut

publicationStmt.publisher: In Fletestrete by Johan Byddell. Dwellyng next to Flete Brydge at the signe of our Lady of pytye. for Wyllyam Marshall,

notesStmt.note: Imprint from colophon; publication date from STC.
The first primer in English; partially based on George Joye's "Ortulus anime" (STC 13828.4)--STC.
Imperfect; some leaves torn, some stained, affecting text throughout.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

person.persName: Johan Byddell. Dwellyng next to Flete Brydge

place.placeName: the signe of our Lady of pytye.
